entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
